titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain engines for snowmobiles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 2/27/2008--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on certain engines for snowmobiles.
